info.+content: Yu Narukami has moved from Tokyo to Inaba to stay with his uncle and cousin, while his parents are away on business. However, after a murder shakes up the sleepy town, things get even more crazy when he discovers the mysterious "Midnight Channel," and that he has the even more mysterious ability to enter TVs. Accompanied by his disbelieving friends, Yu discovers another world inside the TVs, that seems to be connected with the murder. They also discover the ability to summon 'Persona', their 'other selves', whose power they can use to fight the shadows that inhabit the TV world. The murders, the Midnight Channel, the world inside the TV, and Persona. Yu and his friends fight to figure out how they're connected, and to solve the case before it's too late.
#1: "Pursuing My True Self" by Shihoko Hirata (Ep 1)
#3: "True Story" by Rie Kugimiya [as Rise Kujikawa] (Ep 9)
#4: "key plus words" by Shihoko Hirata ft. Yumi Kawamura (eps 13-)
#2: "Beauty of Destiny" by Shihoko Hirata feat. Lotus Juice
#3: "Koi Suru Meitantei" (恋する名探偵; "A Great Detective in Love") by Yui Horie (ep 13)
#4: "The Way of Memories - Kizuna no Chikara" (The Way of Memories -キズナノチカラ-; "The Power of Bonds") by Shihoko Hirata (eps 14-17,19-21,23)
#5: "Honto no Kimochi" (ほんとのきもち; "True Feelings") by Shihoko Hirata (ep 18)
"Koi Suru Meitantei" (恋する名探偵; "A Great Detective in Love") by Yui Horie (ep 13)
